name: Mr. Country, Vince Gill Quiz / Test | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Vince had a new baby and a new wife in 2000-2001. He also has a daughter from his first wife. What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Jenny.

	Jenny is an adult now and is trying to start her own singing group while going to college.

questions.text: Who is Vince's new wife as of the year 2000?
questions.explanation:
Amy Grant.

	They had been friends for a long time.

questions.text: True or false: As of the year 2001, Vince has won more awards than Garth Brooks?
questions.explanation:
True & t & yes & y.

	If you have ever heard him play, or sing you would understand why.

questions.text: True or False: It is said that Vince is the sweetest and most giving man as of the year 2001 in country music history?
questions.explanation:
True & t & yes & y.

	He always goes out of the way for anyone and is always working for others on their albums for free. What a guy!

questions.text: As of the year 2001, is Vince's new baby a boy or a girl?
questions.explanation:
Girl & female.

	His baby girl has so much hair that Amy said that when they got home from the hospital she thought about taking their daughter for her first beauty shop visit.

questions.text: On which CD did Vince first sing with his first child from his first marriage?
questions.explanation:
'Let There Be Peace On Earth'.

	This song will make you cry everytime.

questions.text: Vince's dad lived in what city in Ohio?
questions.explanation:
Columbus.

	He was also a judge.

questions.text: What college did Vince go to?
questions.explanation:
He didn't go to college.

	He knew what he wanted to do and he went and did it. Thank goodness for us that he did.

questions.text: What kind of music did his second wife start out in?
questions.explanation:
Christian.

	Although she still sings, it would be my guess that since she is already singing with Vince on his albums and loves every minute of it, that she just might end up being a country girl.
